body_html: If torch version == Lua Torch, then it still might be related to /dev/shm. Lua Torch can use threads (there's no GIL), so it doesn't need to go through shared mem (they all share a single address space).
body_text: If torch version == Lua Torch, then it still might be related to /dev/shm. Lua Torch can use threads (there's no GIL), so it doesn't need to go through shared mem (they all share a single address space).
body: If torch version == Lua Torch, then it still might be related to `/dev/shm`. Lua Torch can use threads (there's no GIL), so it doesn't need to go through shared mem (they all share a single address space).
